name: Hatslingers
description:
** THE GAME REQUIRES AT LEAST 2 CONTROLLERS TO BE PLAYABLE **

A lone bandit enters the town. Windows are being boarded up, children can be heard asking their parents if everything is going to be OK. The townsfolk are hiding, the bandit known for his quick draw and his excellent aim.  

Don't let his, nor any of his companions, appearance fool you – they may look like children, but their hat-game is way better than any adults.

Play as one of the notorious "Hat bandits" and steal gold from the town mine and make it your own - but watch out for your fellow bandit friends, they also want the gold!

Attack and defend yourself with your awesome hat by throwing it at your friends, while also making sure that you avoid those pesky mining holes.

Battle against your friends (2 to 4 players) in a fast-paced competitive, local multiplayer and become the greatest bandit of the Wild, Wild, West.
